mapper.select: SELECT t.trainerId, a.name, t.phone, t.birthDate, a.email, t.gender, t.payPerSession, t.baseSalary, t.careerYears FROM trainer t JOIN app_user a ON t.trainerId = a.userId
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO trainer (trainerId, phone, gender, birthDate, baseSalary, payPerSession, careerYears, created_at) VALUES (#{trainerId}, #{phone}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{baseSalary}, #{payPerSession},#{careerYears},#{createdAt})
mapper.select: select a.name from trainer t JOIN app_user a ON t.trainerId = a.userId

SELECT TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'yyyy-MM') AS "month", COUNT(*) AS count FROM pt_package p JOIN app_user u ON p.trainerId = u.userId WHERE u.name = #{trainerName} AND p.created_at >= DATEADD('MONTH', -6, CURRENT_DATE) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(p.created_at, 'yyyy-MM') ORDER BY "month"

SELECT t.trainerId as trainerId, u.email as email, u.password as password, u.name as name, t.phone as phone, u.role as role, t.birthDate as birthDate, t.gender as gender, t.payPerSession as payPerSession, t.baseSalary as baseSalary, t.careerYears as careerYears, t.updated_at as updatedAt, t.created_at as createdAt FROM trainer t JOIN app_user u ON t.trainerId = u.userId WHERE t.trainerId = #{trainerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE trainer SET birthDate = #{birthDate}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, payPerSession = #{payPerSession}, baseSalary = #{baseSalary}, careerYears = #{careerYears}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE trainerId = #{trainerId}
